casebody.data:
Marion LIU, Individually and as Successor in Interest to Augustine Liu, Deceased, petitioner,
v.
JANSSEN RESEARCH & DEVELOPMENT, LLC. No. 18-97. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 1, 2018. Petition of writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeal of California, Second Appellate District denied. Justice ALITO took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
